long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A powerful Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience by providing customizable context menu search options. This extension allows you to organize and manage various search tools and quickly access them through the right-click context menu.

üîç Customizable Search Groups
Create and manage groups of search tools
Organize searches by category (e.g., Google, VirusTotal, CyberChef)
Add custom icons to groups for easy identification
Drag and drop to reorder groups

üéØ Flexible Search Options
Add custom search URLs with the %SEARCH_TEXT placeholder
Support for both selected text and clipboard content
Optional Base64 encoding for search text
URL encoding option for handling special characters
Automatic favicon fetching for visual identification

‚ö° Quick Add Feature
Popup interface for rapidly adding new search items
Group selection dropdown
Form state preservation between sessions
Instant context menu updates
üÜïRight Click search using the content of your clipboard (when no text is selected)

üõ†Ô∏è Advanced Management
Full edit capabilities for existing items
Drag-and-drop reordering within groups
Bulk import/export functionality
Storage usage monitoring
Automatic favicon updates

üí´ User Experience
üÜïDark Mode
Clean, modern interface
Responsive design
Animated transitions
Keyboard shortcuts support
Tooltips and helpful instructions

üîí Security & Performance
Manifest V3 compliant
Efficient context menu updates
Storage optimization
Error handling and validation
